title: Biden Must Be Impeached (Ep 1596)
description:
Joe Biden must be impeached! An explosive story surfaced yesterday about a quid pro quo between Joe Biden and the Afghan President. In this episode, I address the story along with the new data about mask mandates. 

News Picks:

Impeach! Biden gets caught in a scandalous quid pro quo.


Chase bank does an about face after cancelling General Flynn.

Are digital vaccine certificates coming to your state? 

Facebook moves to silence conservative voices. 

Another study showing that the mask fanatics are wrong.

Our reputation overseas is destroyed, thanks to Joe Biden. 


Our national debt, and annual deficits, are exploding.

Home schooling is growing, as parents tire of the public school indoctrination factories.
